docs.lead_paragraph: Until recently, most medical schools provided little information on financial factors, like how the insurance system works and how treatment costs affect patients’ behavior.

headline.seo: Teaching New Doctors the Cost of Those Tests They Order
headline.main: Teaching Physicians the Price of Care
headline.print_headline: Teaching Physicians The Price Of Care

docs.snippet: Until recently, most medical schools provided little information on financial factors, like how the insurance system works and how treatment costs affect patients’ behavior.

byline.contributor: This article was produced in collaboration with Kaiser Health News — an editorially independent program of the Kaiser Family Foundation, a nonpartisan health policy research organization not affiliated with Kaiser Permanente.

docs.lead_paragraph: The placebo effect is, potentially, one of the most powerful forces in medicine. The challenge is to harness that power in a reliable and systematic way.
docs.abstract: Seeking some understanding about how hope, fear and trust factor into medicine.
docs.snippet: Seeking some understanding about how hope, fear and trust factor into medicine.

docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Tada rose to prominence for a series of experiments that pointed to the existence of suppressor cells, and later took up writing traditional Noh plays.

headline.seo: Tomio Tada, Influential Immunologist And Playwright, Dies at 76
headline.main: Tomio Tada, Influential Immunologist and Author of Japanese Plays, Dies at 76
headline.print_headline: Tomio Tada, Influential Immunologist And Author of Japanese Plays, Dies at 76

docs.snippet: Dr. Tada rose to prominence for a series of experiments that pointed to the existence of suppressor cells, and later took up writing traditional Noh plays.
